name: Reach the Core!
description:
A short 3D puzzle-platformer made with Godot Engine!

The power source is malfunctioning, so the lights switch on and off. Race to the bottom, even through the darkness, to shut it down.

Time to finish: 10-15 minutes

Controls: Keyboard (WASD to look around, Arrow keys to move, [Esc] to restart, Spacebar to interact)

Audio: None

Ages: Everyone

For a full-length game also made with Godot Engine, you can play JJ!
